metadata.title: CVE-2023-4234 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ofono, an Open Source Telephony on Linux. A stackoverflow bug is triggered within the decode_submit_report() function duringthe SMS decoding. It is assumed that the attack scenario is accessible froma compromised modem, a malicious base station, or just SMS. There is abound check for this memcpy length in decode_submit(), but it was forgottenin decode_submit_report().

criterions.comment: ofono package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
